----------------- 1.Description -----------------
The Offering was supposed to be sacrificed to some higher entity, who chose instead, as a form of cruel joke, to steal her heart and give her another's.
She's a Tank hybrid meant to be played on the frontline. This is the version 2.0 of my "The Offering" mod i uploaded a year ago on the Nexus. That means the Offering 1.0 is now officially unsupported and will no longer be updated.
----------------- 2.Known Issues -----------------
